schema:creator: Dao, Alex
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ My painting of colorful carrots is water color painting. The inspiration comes from going to the Davis Farmers Market and also it means we belong to a diverse community with many people of different sizes and colors. It means we are an inclusive community coming together which makes us very beautiful and special.  
 __Participant age:__ 24  
 __Category:__  Adult Age 15+: Drawing or Painting
schema:name: Inclusion
